In England, in the seven days to 08 June, there were 35,971 new confirmed cases (63.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 June, there were 21,132 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 70% (14,839 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 June is 3,981,497 (7,073.6 cases per 100,000 population).
